description: This file defines the interface for PKI entity management, including functions for generating key pairs, handling certificates and CRLs, and exporting PKCS7 encodings. It provides function declarations for operations such as removing entities, managing handles, verifying certificates, exporting certificates, and setting/getting configuration parameters.

methods.name: CAEntityRemoveCRL
methods.description: Removes the CRL associated with the CA entity.

methods.name: CAEntityGetCertHandle
methods.description: Retrieves the handle to the certificate.

methods.name: CAEntityGetCRLHandle
methods.description: Retrieves the handle to the CRL.

methods.name: CAEntitySetCRLHandle
methods.description: Sets the handle for the CRL with provided encoding.

methods.name: CAEntityIsSameCert
methods.description: Checks if a given certificate matches the entity's certificate.

methods.name: CAEntityVerifyChild
methods.description: Verifies the given child certificate against the entity, with options for CRL checks.

methods.name: CAEntityExportPKCS7Encode
methods.description: Exports the entity's certificate in PKCS7 encoding format.

methods.name: CAEntityGetCRLAddress
methods.description: Retrieves the address URL or location of the CRL.

methods.name: CAEntitySetCRLAddress
methods.description: Sets the address URL or location for the CRL.

methods.name: CAEntityGetCRLPeriod
methods.description: Gets the refresh period for the CRL.

methods.name: CAEntitySetCRLPeriod
methods.description: Sets the refresh period for the CRL.
